TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TiffBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder

Docs.summary: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] bitmap format supports frame level thumbnails, multiple frames, and frame level metadata. It does not support global preview, global thumbnails, or global metadata. Encoding does not work in partial trust. See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust. ## XAML Text Usage

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the type of compression that is used by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] image.
Docs.value: One of the values. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The , , and values require that the value be set to . ## XAML Text Usage ## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the property.
